summary: REQ-2 and part of REQ-3 appear implemented (order-page alert/attestation removal; confirmation-page wording removal). REQ-1 and the prices-page portion of REQ-3 cannot be conclusively verified from the provided diffs. Several unrelated enhancements (admin features, styling, deployment docs, config/utilities) were introduced that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the “Important Legal Notice” section and any other legal/novelty disclaimer messaging from the marketing homepage.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx is truncated and the diff excerpt does not show removal of the section titled “Important Legal Notice” or the specific novelty/legal disclaimer sentences; cannot verify the requirement is satisfied from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove legal/novelty notice wording from other customer-facing ordering-flow pages where it appears (e.g., prices page and order confirmation content).
missing_requirements.reason: OrderConfirmationPage is described as having legal/novelty wording removed, but PricesPage.tsx is truncated and does not show whether any prior novelty/legal disclaimer text existed and was removed; cannot fully verify REQ-3 across all mentioned pages from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin order management UI enhancements (dashboard filtering, stats, payment status badges; detailed order details page; payment contact controls changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists admin order management features as a non-goal; these changes go beyond removing customer-facing legal/novelty notices.

hallucinated_features.description: Routing/app-level changes related to admin panel visibility, admin verification error handling and retry UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; unrelated to removing legal/novelty notices from customer ordering experience.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication/React Query hook behavior changes (useOrders hardened submitOrder error; useAdmin hook changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements only asked to remove attestation gating and keep existing submit behavior, not to change hook semantics or admin checks.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling and Tailwind theme changes (OKLCH color system, typography, overflow guards; Inter font and extended color tokens).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope was content removal of legal/novelty notices without broader redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated deployment documentation and centralized configuration/utilities for assets and environment (DEPLOYMENT.md, config.ts, assetPaths.ts, usStates.ts, fileValidation.ts, SignaturePad).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; these are broader platform/documentation/utilities additions unrelated to removing legal/novelty notices.
